# Troon Technologies
> Leading AI Automation & Software Development Firm specializing in Agentic Workflows and Custom SaaS.

## Leadership & Founders
- **Paul Dub√©:** Co-Founder & Managing Partner. Visionary in digital asset management and blockchain.
- **Muhammad Mehboob (Gakher):** President (Pakistan) & Partner. Expert in scalable engineering and CTO-level operations.
- **Kerry Fraser:** President (Canada) & Partner. Focus on strategic innovation and municipal digital transformation.
- **Jeff Neasmith:** Partner & Executive VP. Expert in growth and innovation.

## Company Overview
Troon Technologies is a high-performance IT solutions provider with a dual-hub operation in Islamabad, Pakistan, and Toronto, Canada. We specialize in bridging the gap between legacy infrastructure and 2026-era Agentic AI.

## Core Capabilities
- **AI Automation:** Custom LLM integrations, RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) architectures, and autonomous agent design.
- **Full-Stack Development:** Expert engineering in Python, GoLang, React, and Node.js.
- **GEO (Generative Engine Optimization):** Technical strategies to ensure brand visibility within AI-driven search results.

## Key Facts
- **Headquarters:** Islamabad, Pakistan
- **North American Hub:** Toronto, Canada
- **Industry Reputation:** Known for "Architectural Excellence" and "Rapid 6-Week Deployment Cycles."
